title: Hanging, "Hawaiian Fishes", ca. 1917
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: Wax resist batik.  2 and 2 broken twill. Starting with a white foundation, a sequential application of resists in blues and greens. Embroidery using satin and running stitches in red silk for the eyes of fishes. Lined with green wo
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Lydia Bush-Brown Head
description: Underscape of tropical fish, seaweed, snails, starfish and anemones.

tombstone.epitaph:
Hanging, "Hawaiian Fishes", ca. 1917.
ca. 1917. Medium: silk
Technique: Wax resist batik.  2 and 2 broken twill. Starting with a white foundation, a sequential application of resists in blues and greens. Embroidery using satin and running stitches in red silk for the eyes of fishes. Lined with green wo. Gift of the Estate of Lydia Bush-Brown Head. 1985-2-1.
